band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Zinc alloy plating watchcase IP black strap.
sentences.chinese: 锌合金表壳表带电镀IP黑色。

sentences.english: The strap of this watch simply threads through the back of the face, and so can easily be changed.
sentences.chinese: 表带以很简单的方式穿过表背部，因而可方便替换。

sentences.english: The strap can be attached at the top or sides to convert the bag to a fold-over style.
sentences.chinese: 表带可以附加在顶部或两侧转换袋一个折叠式风格。

sentences.english: I wish I could get a band that was a little bigger.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能够拥有跟大一点的表带。

sentences.english: They can also be used to connect a buckle or clasp to your watchband .
sentences.chinese: 它们也可以用于连接扣或扣你的表带。

sentences.english: Spray inside shoes, watch bands and gloves and under fingernails periodically.
sentences.chinese: 鞋内喷雾，手套，手表带和定期下指甲。

sentences.english: Pink gold, silver sunburst godron dial with applied indexes, interchangeable havana alligator strap.
sentences.chinese: 粉金色外壳，银指针和指标，可互换的鳄鱼皮表带。

sentences.english: Silver stainless steel case with black croco leather strap. Black dial. Modern Roman numeral hour markers.
sentences.chinese: 银色不锈钢的表壳，黑色鳄鱼皮表带。

sentences.english: They are the bars that are used to connect your watchband to your watch.
sentences.chinese: 它们是用来连接到您的手表表带酒吧。

sentences.english: The only size that it comes in has a watch band that just fit around my wrist.
sentences.chinese: 唯一可以伸缩的是表带从而适合我的手腕。

sentences.english: Hook-and-loop top strap keeps the foot locked down over the footbed.
sentences.chinese: 钩环的顶级表带保持锁定在鞋垫的脚。

sentences.english: If it is a special love of sweating, it is not suitable to wear leather watchband.
sentences.chinese: 如果是特别爱出汗的人，就不适合佩戴皮表带了。

sentences.english: Which wristwatch straps are the Swiss wristwatch straps?
sentences.chinese: 那些表带是瑞士制造的？

sentences.english: On durable Leather Watchband than metal bracelet must not.
sentences.chinese: 要论结实耐用，皮表带比金属表带肯定不行了。

sentences.english: On durable Leather Watchband than metal bracelet must not.
sentences.chinese: 要论结实耐用，皮表带比金属表带肯定不行了。

definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
to wear a watch/a homophone for 代表 used to avoid Internet censorship in the PRC
